full_summary:
### He-Cryostat System Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Number:   WS3764705784
* Date of Publication:   November 25, 2022
* Closing Date:   December 22, 2022, 2:00 PM EST

#### Government of Canada Entity Information
* Contracting Entity:   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Address:  11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Solicitation Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) on behalf of Natural Resources Canada to acquire a He-Cryostat system to be used at Quebec.

The RFP includes the delivery of the system, as detailed in the request for proposals. Interested suppliers must submit their bids in accordance with the solicitation documents.

**Important Note**: The closing time for bid submission has been modified to December 22, 2022, at 2:00 PM EST. Any bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

#### Contact Information
* Contact Name:  Uribe, Rafael (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email:   [rafael.uribe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:rafael.uribe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Solicitation Attachments
[Click here to download the solicitation documents](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14737824?extsite=MTQ3Mzc4MjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Trade Agreement
This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

Note to the readers: if you need to add any UNSPSC-related information, please let me know, and I'll update it accordingly.


---

**UNSPSC Information**

* UNSPSC Code:  41103300
* UNSPSC Description: Fluid mechanics equipment

**Contractual Information**

* Category:   Goods
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open bidding
* Expected Start Date:   Not applicable
* Expected End Date:   June 30, 2023

---

Subject to any additional questions or clarifications, I hope this rewritten version meets all your requirements!
